effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to activate a Winning Streak! increasing the damage of your Rising Sun Kick and Spinning Crane Kick by 3% stacking up to 10 times. Rising Sun Kick and Spinning Crane Kick have a 15% chance to remove Winning Streak!

Set: Fists of Fury applies 1 stack of  Winning Streak! when cast and when finished channeling completely. The damage of your next Fists of Fury is increased by 8% per stack when  Winning Streak! is removed.

Your  Winning Streak! is always removed once it reaches max stacks.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Fearless Gladiator's Ironskin Slippers

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description:
Equip: Your abilities have a chance to call the Darkness to you, increasing your Agility by 2,145, up to 10,728.

Upon reaching full power, the Darkness is unleashed, inflicting 2.2 million Shadow damage split between nearby enemies over 15 sec before fading back into the remnant.

Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 6,770 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 178 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Gain a high chance to follow up your attacks with a fiery gilded uppercut, dealing 372,319 Fire damage to your target. Molten gold continues to splatter to deal 103,422 Fire damage over 5 sec to all nearby enemies. Damage reduced beyond 8 enemies.
Equip: Your damaging spells and abilities have a chance to deal 178,656 damage to your target. The magic school chosen is based upon your selection of socketed Khaz Algar gems.
